mapper.select: SELECT a.site_id, a.url, pageviews1, ip1, pageviews2, ip2 FROM (SELECT site_id, url, count(*) pageviews1, count(DISTINCT ip) ip1 FROM statistics WHERE time > DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND time < #{currentDate} AND site_id = #{siteId} ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT site_id, url, count(*) pageviews2, count(DISTINCT ip) ip2 FROM statistics WHERE time > DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND time < DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND site_id = #{siteId} ) b ON a.site_id=b.site_id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time,"%H") timeDay, count(*) pageviews, count(DISTINCT ip) ip
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time,"%Y-%m-%d") timeDay, count(*) pageviews, count(DISTINCT ip) ip
FROM statistics
WHERE time > DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 3 DAY),INTERVAL #{day} DAY) AND time < DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
WHERE time > DATE_SUB(#{currentDate},INTERVAL #{day} DAY) AND time < #{currentDate}
AND site_id = #{siteId}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time,"%H")
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time,"%Y-%m-%d")
